etymology.description: 日 (sun; day; Japan) + 本 (origin; root) = origin of the sun (Japan)
etymology.interpretation: Literally “origin of the sun,” referencing Japan’s position east of China where the sun rises; hence the epithet “Land of the Rising Sun.”

examples.chinese: 日本位于亚洲东部(日本位於亞洲東部)，日出较早(日出較早)。
examples.pinyin: Rìběn wèiyú Yàzhōu dōngbù, rìchū jiào zǎo.
examples.english: Japan lies in eastern Asia, where the sun rises earlier.

examples.chinese: 我计划明年去日本旅行(我計劃明年去日本旅行)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ jìhuà míngnián qù Rìběn lǚxíng.
examples.english: I plan to travel to Japan next year.

examples.chinese: 日本的首都是东京(日本的首都是東京)。
